text: Marie-Claude Vayssade (8 August 1936 – 11 November 2020) was a French politician. She was a member of the European Parliament from 1979 to 1994. Vayssade was a member of the Socialist Party. She was born in Pierrepont, France. Vayssade died on 11 November 2020 in Vandœuvre-lès-Nancy, France at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:MEPs for France Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:People from Meurthe-et-Moselle
title: Marie-Claude Vayssade
